DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare step care model treatment social phobia panic disorder standard psychological treatment . The stepped care model comprise three step : short psycho-education , 10 week Internet-based self-help program , 12 week individual cognitive-behavioural therapy . Patients assessed step take study show significant clinical improvement follow 12 month . Patients randomize either step care model standard psychological treatment , i.e . individual cognitive-behavioural therapy . All treatment component manualized .
